item.title: Markdown 设置字体颜色
item.description: Red paragraph text this is a test Summary: Typora is a very good markdown editor, and today I’ll show you how to use typora to set the color of the font, Example is as follow. Typora虽然是一款markdown编辑器，但是其实也可以设置字体颜
